#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 10001

int hash[MAX];
int arr[MAX];
int temp[MAX];

int main(){
    int x,y,n,q,i;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);

    temp[1] = 1;

    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        scanf("%d",arr+i);
/*
    for(i=2;i<=n;i++){
        if(hash[arr[i]])
            temp[i] = temp[i-1];
        else{
            hash[arr[i]] = 1;
            temp[i] = temp[i-1] + 1;
        }
    }
*/
    while(q--){
        scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
        int hash[MAX] = {};
        int sum = 0;

        for(i=x;i<=y;i++)
        {
            if(hash[arr[i]] == 0){
                hash[arr[i]] = 1;
                sum++;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
